contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.qandaqu.QAndAQuestionPageContent:
Do we have any built in function to resize image from url?
example: I've a url like this: [http://localhost:9614/getContentAsset/663c1414-1291-4ea9-9be6-1f4abefcae7e/5946b7ee-dae8-494e-bd49-94d95a25d4b2/Banner-Desktop.webp](http://localhost:9614/getContentAsset/663c1414-1291-4ea9-9be6-1f4abefcae7e/5946b7ee-dae8-494e-bd49-94d95a25d4b2/Banner-Desktop.webp?width=400\&height=300)\ can we add any param to resize image, or have a function, when we upload image, it should generate another image with correct dimension?
I see Image variant, but I don't know how to use it, could you help give me a sample?
***
**Environment**
* Xperience by Kentico version: \[30.6.0]
* .NET version: 9
